00058 #define Q_SIGNAL_SIZE  1
00059 
00060 /* Exact-width types. WG14/N843 C99 Standard, Section 7.18.1.1 */
00061 typedef signed   char  int8_t;       
00062 typedef signed   short int16_t;      
00063 typedef signed   long  int32_t;      
00064 typedef unsigned char  uint8_t;    
00065 typedef unsigned short uint16_t;   
00066 typedef unsigned long  uint32_t;   
00068 #include "qep.h"               /* QEP platform-independent public interface */
00069 
00070 #endif                                                        /* qep_port_h */
